DOC.brief_summary: Exercise training immersible ergocycle become popular appear suitable men woman even poor physical activity level . Commercial tagline highlight beneficial effect activity weight management . However poor information concern energy response induced activity . The aim project investigate energetic response ( energy expenditure food intake ) single bout cycle exercise water v dryland normal weight overweight premenopausal woman .
DOC.detailed_description: After inclusion visit , subject submit DXA obtain body composition data . Then subject submit four experimental session semi-randomized order . For session , subject take standardize breakfast ( 570kcal ) three hour experimental session . Control session ( CON ) : subject stand sit without activity 30 min . Water exercise session ( WAT ) : subject exercise immerse ergocycle 30 min 50 rpm . Dryland session 1 ( LAND-1 ) : subject exercise dryland , ergocycle WAT session , 30 min 50 rpm . Dryland session 2 ( LAND-2 ) : subject exercise dryland ergocycle WAT . Intensity exercise set heart rate average WAT session , exercise stop subject reach energy expenditure WAT session . During session , energy expenditure , heart rate rate perceive exertion measure 15 min 30min . Appetite hunger sensation measure specific scale different time point day experimental session . Thirty minute end experimental session subject buffet meal lunch time .
DOC.criteria: Women age 23 40 year BMI 25kg.m2 normal weight woman 25 29,9 kg.m2 overweight woman Daily breakfast Subject approve informed consent Subject French medical affiliation Specific medical treatment Aquaphobia Subject specific diet regimen weight loss program Subject cardiovascular disease Surgical intervention le 3 month Subject refuse informed write consent Subject without French medical affiliation subject refuse inscription national voluntary list subject exclusion period subject smoking drinking alcohol frequently subject intense physical activity
